H0.text: who developed the concept of total quality management. Joseph Juran

H1.text: who developed the concept of total quality management. Armand V. Feigenbaum

H2.text: who developed the concept of total quality management. Kaoru Ishikawa

H3.text: who developed the concept of total quality management. W. Edwards Deming

A4.text: He devised the concept of Total Quality Control (TQM), now known as 'total quality management'.

A5.text: Val Feigenbaum's significant contributions ... to define total quality in a workable and practical way.
